item.title: Predicting intention to receive a seasonal influenza vaccination using Protection Motivation Theory
Systematic review of meditation-based interventions for children with ADHD
Mitigation system threat partially mediates the effects of right-wing ideologies on climate change beliefs
Susceptibility to Misinformation
item.description: While misinformation affects society broadly, its impacts are not homogenously distributed, with some individuals being more susceptible to its effects. This program of research aims to identify the factors that make an individual susceptible or resistant to misinformation.
